snippet: Simeonette Mapes, 29, a social studies teacher at the School for Classics, was found dead by her husband in their Staten Island home.
abstract: Public school teacher Simeonette Mapes is found dead in her Staten Island home; motive for the killing is unclear, and no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: Simeonette Mapes, 29, a social studies teacher at the School for Classics, was found dead by her husband in their Staten Island home.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Teacher Is Stabbed to Death in Her Staten Island Home
